text: Bruce J. Schulman is an American historian, currently the William E. Huntington Professor at Boston University. According to his faculty profile, Schulman is writing the "volume for the Oxford History of the United States covering the years 1896-1929." ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Boston University faculty Category:21st-century American historians Category:Yale University alumni Category:Stanford University alumni
title: Bruce Schulman
